PASSWORD_LENGTH_NOT_CORRECT: password must be more than 6 symbols
NAME_LENGTH_NOT_CORRECT: name must be more than 3 symbols
DESC_LENGTH_NOT_CORRECT: description must be more than 3 symbols
NOT_VALID_DEV_POINTS_CAPACITY: developer points capacity is not valid
DEV_POINTS_CAPACITY_NOT_NUMBER: developer points capacity must be a number
SPRINT_LENGTH_NOT_NUMBER: sprint length must be a number
POINTS_LENGTH_NOT_NUMBER: point length must be a number
USER_ID_NOT_NUMBER: user id must be a number
PROJECT_ID_NOT_NUMBER: project id must be a number
USER_CREATED_ASSIGNED: user has been created and assigned to the project
USER_ALREADY_ASSIGNED: user had been already assigned before
